graph

Class HLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.HLink

  • public class HLink
extends java.lang.Object
    represents nets connecting multiple nodes in hyper-graphs. Not thread-safe.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
